root: ^Maybe he's right, it is people's instinct to desire more power and to express the dissatisfaction.
^I might also face the possible desire and emotion inside myself? Just, maybe not that extreme…?
^*you feel like you understood the source of anger from your Boss, some special emotion came up into your mind*
^*the wisp of emotion mingled, swriled, and shimmered inside your brain just like the lighthouse in the endless sea*
